newFeatures: Added plugin system with page plugin support
Added plugin management components and features
improvements: Refactored application context management with optimized state management logic
Added error handling module to improve application stability
Removed tailwindcss dependency, simplified style variable system
Optimized i18n loading logic for improved language pack loading performance
Optimized route lazy loading and preloading strategies
Refactored storage service with optimized initialization flow
Adjusted sidebar and bottom action bar styling and interactions
Optimized notification exit animations with placeholder elements to prevent layout shifts
